name.description: name that identifies the name of the bus-stop

GeoCoordinates.description: Coordinates of the location in EPSG 4326 projection standard

id.description: name that identifies a unique object

city.description: name identifying the name of the city where the bus stop is located

postal_code.description: number identifying the postcode of the city where the bus stop is located

address.description: name identifying the name of the street where the bus stop is located
